qas.question: Which sports team has the world's largest social media following?
How Ballon d'Or awards have members of the Barcelona team won?
How amny FIFA World Player of the Year have members of FC Barcelona won?
How amny of Barcelona's players were picked as the three best players of the year in 2010?
Where did Messi, Iniesta and Xavi learn their football in Barcelona?

context: <a0_0>Barcelona<a0_0/> is one of the most supported teams in the world, and has the largest social media following in the world among sports teams. Barcelona's players have won a record number of Ballon d'Or awards (<a1_0>11<a1_0/>), as well as a record number of FIFA World Player of the Year awards (<a2_0>7<a2_0/>). In 2010, the club made history when <a3_0>three<a3_0/> players who came through its <a4_0>youth academy<a4_0/> (Messi, Iniesta and Xavi) were chosen as the three best players in the world in the FIFA Ballon d'Or awards, an unprecedented feat for players from the same football school.
